job.title: Software Engineer, Web
job.description: pstrongWho we arestrongppSuperDraft is a New Hampshire and Las Vegas based company that is focused on paid entry and free to play daily fantasy and sports betting in the US The Company has developed several unique game modes and features that appeal to both casual and hardcore sports fans and fantasy playersppbrppstrongWho you arestrongppYoull be a creative contributor to the entire Agile development lifecycle from design and implementation to testing and monitoringppbrppstrongWhat youll dostrongpulliWrite clean wellorganized testable and reusable JavaScript and TypescriptliliBuild performant welltested User Interface components in React and ReduxliliImprove performance by identifying and fixing bottlenecks using industry standard patterns and practicesliliParticipate in product spec reviews technical design reviews and code reviewsliulpbrppstrongWhat youll bringstrongpulliExcellent verbal and written communication skillsliliUnderstanding of JavaScript development best practices ES6 preferredlili2 years experience working with modern frontend frameworks React SASS etcliliExperience with common tools like Webpack npm and JestliliExperience building reusable components with an eye towards responsive designliliExperience translating product requirements into technical specificationsliliBachelors degree in a technical major or equivalent work experienceliulpbrppstrongWhat well lovestrongpulliExperience with React hooksliulpbrppstrongWhat well bringstrongppSuperDraft is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate based on race gender or sexual orientationppbrppEmployees receive a competitive benefits package including health insurance paid vacationsick leave and stock optionsp
